CORE-FOUNDATION.name: Core Foundation Package
CORE-FOUNDATION.description: Project Discovery & Kick-off Workshop, Node.js/Express.js Backend Scaffolding, PostgreSQL/MongoDB Database Setup & Configuration, Core Security Package, Basic Developer Admin Panel, Deployment & CI/CD Setup, Standard SEO Tags, Up to 5 Static Pages, 1 Standard Contact Form

DSN-001.name: UI/UX Wireframes
DSN-001.description: 5-7 Unique Screens, low-fidelity, black-and-white layout focusing on user flow and information hierarchy

DSN-002.name: High-Fidelity Mockups
DSN-002.description: 5-7 Unique Screens, full-color, pixel-perfect Figma design, complete with design system and typography

DSN-003.name: Advanced Animations
DSN-003.description: Implementation of complex, performance-optimized animations (e.g., GSAP, Lottie, intricate scroll interactions)

CMS-001.name: Blog / Content System
CMS-001.description: A complete dynamic blogging platform including post creation, categorization, tagging, and management via the admin panel

CMS-002.name: Advanced CMS
CMS-002.description: Custom post types (e.g., Events, Team Profiles, Project Portfolios) with tailored input fields and management interfaces

AUTH-001.name: Standard User Authentication
AUTH-001.description: Full suite of user management: Login, Register, Forgot Password workflow, Email Verification, and a dedicated User Profile Page

AUTH-002.name: Social Login
AUTH-002.description: Integration for third-party authentication services (e.g., Google, Facebook, LinkedIn)

AUTH-003.name: Advanced Roles & Permissions
AUTH-003.description: Custom authorization levels and permissions matrix (e.g., Admin, Editor, Moderator, Premium Customer)

AUTH-004.name: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
AUTH-004.description: Implementation of SMS or Email-based multi-factor authentication for enhanced account security

ECO-001.name: Basic E-Commerce
ECO-001.description: Product Management, Shopping Cart functionality, and an Order Management system for the administrator

ECO-002.name: Advanced E-Commerce
ECO-002.description: Extended capabilities including Inventory Management, sophisticated Discount Coupon logic, and User Review systems

PAY-001.name: M-Pesa Integration
PAY-001.description: Custom Daraja API (STK Push) integration, including validation and callback logic for automated transaction confirmation

PAY-002.name: Card Payment Gateway
PAY-002.description: Integration with a major international gateway such as Stripe, Paystack, or similar processors

PAY-003.name: Subscription/SaaS Billing
PAY-003.description: Logic for recurring billing, automated payment failures, and a management platform for user subscription states

FEAT-001.name: Advanced Booking System
FEAT-001.description: Complex scheduling logic, calendar integration, time slot management, and administrator-side availability control

FEAT-002.name: Basic Search Functionality
FEAT-002.description: Basic, high-speed site search implementation over static content and core database tables

FEAT-003.name: Advanced Search
FEAT-003.description: Integration with specialized search technologies (e.g., Algolia, Elasticsearch) for complex querying, filtering, and facets

FEAT-004.name: Multi-language Support
FEAT-004.description: Implementation of internationalization (i18n) and localization (l10n) framework

API-001.name: Custom API Development
API-001.description: Development of a dedicated, optimized REST or GraphQL API for mobile application consumption or third-party data exchange

API-002.name: 3rd-Party Integration
API-002.description: Secure integration with specific external APIs (e.g., Mailchimp for email, a specific CRM, Google Maps API for geolocation)
